[ { "id": 1, "category_id": "1", "title": "This is Amazing Indias", "featured_image": "9taCCstxpihSo9bxJzYpatkBrN743WRhKMdXs6VT.jpeg", "content": "Gevolglik sal die doelwitte van stakings die produsente se verander van veeleisende stygings in lone aan die beheer van hul aandeel in die produksie", "status": "PUBLISH", "created_at": "2019-12-30 10:33:10", "updated_at": "2020-01-08 10:22:05", "featured_image_url": "http://localhost/lara-react/public/storage/post_img/9taCCstxpihSo9bxJzYpatkBrN743WRhKMdXs6VT.jpeg", "featured_image_thumb_url": "http://localhost/lara-react/public/storage/post_img/thumb/9taCCstxpihSo9bxJzYpatkBrN743WRhKMdXs6VT.jpeg", "category": { "id": 1, "name": "Foods", "created_at": "2019-12-30 10:12:42", "updated_at": "2020-01-06 09:15:38" } }, { "id": 2, "category_id": "1", "title": "Dus, al die arbeidsmag wat werk vir die samelewing is sielkundig apaties", "featured_image": "default.png", "content": "Omdat die een eenheid is al wat nodig is om in die behoeftes van 'n individu te voldoen, is die addisionele eenhede verkry vir die doel van spaar Daar is geen regverdiging vir sodanige optrede, deur die diktatoriale argument is dat die samelewing eintlik bestaan ​​uit talle segmente, waarvan een die likwidasie van ander onderneem om slegs te bly in krag", "status": "DRAFT", "created_at": "2019-12-30 10:34:35", "updated_at": "2019-12-30 10:34:35", "featured_image_url": "http://localhost/lara-react/public/storage/post_img/default.png", "featured_image_thumb_url": "http://localhost/lara-react/public/storage/post_img/thumb/default.png", "category": { "id": 1, "name": "Foods", "created_at": "2019-12-30 10:12:42", "updated_at": "2020-01-06 09:15:38" } }, { "id": 4, "category_id": "8", "title": "The family is like a plant, with branches, stems, leaves and blossoms", "featured_image": "default.png", "content": "

Mass movements are independent movements to assert the identity of a group conquered or oppressed by another group

The elections and plebiscites were invented to cover the failure of these unsuccessful experiments to solve this problem

Man's work obscures woman's beautiful features which are created for female roles

Cultivating nature into farms and gardens is an artificial process that has no relevance to the plant itself

All that is left before the masses now is the struggle to eliminate all prevailing forms of dictatorial governments, be they parliament, sect, tribe, class, one-party system, two-party system or multi-party system, which falsely call themselves democracies

Domestic servants, paid or unpaid, are a type of slave

", "status": "PUBLISH", "created_at": "2020-01-06 09:44:02", "updated_at": "2020-01-06 09:44:02", "featured_image_url": "http://localhost/lara-react/public/storage/post_img/default.png", "featured_image_thumb_url": "http://localhost/lara-react/public/storage/post_img/thumb/default.png", "category": { "id": 8, "name": "Kirana", "created_at": "2020-01-03 10:40:42", "updated_at": "2020-01-03 10:40:42" } }, { "id": 5, "category_id": "6", "title": "Digital India is real ???", "featured_image": "default.png", "content": "

Digital India is real ???

 

Wage-earners, however improved their wages may be, are a type of slave

The population of other races has decreased because of birth control, restrictions on marriage, and constant occupation in work, unlike the Blacks, who tend to be less obsessive about work in a climate which is continuously hot

Stress should be laid on social reality and family care in order to bring up an integrated well-educated human

Thus, these social bonds, benefits, advantages and ideals associated with them are lost wherever the family, the tribe, the nation or humankind vanish or are lost

The social relationship is, therefore, a national relationship and the national is a social relationship

Popular Conferences and People's Committees are the fruition of the people's struggle for democracy

It is right of all people for their health and recreational benefit
